definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing

sentences.english: We're gonna get together go to the wonderful light show on the mid-autumn day.
sentences.chinese: 在中秋那天夜晚，我們將一起去看燈會。

sentences.english: Becuase i loved you from that day on
sentences.chinese: 因爲從那天開始我愛上了你。

sentences.english: She was seated on my right that day.
A full moon hung in the sky on Mid-autumn Day.
sentences.chinese: 中秋那天，一輪圓月掛在天空。

sentences.english: The rest of the story is what she told me happened.
sentences.chinese: 下面的故事是她告訴我的那天所發生的事情。

sentences.english: That night the smallest rabbit hid in the grass by the pool.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，最小的兔子藏在小池邊的矮樹叢裏。

sentences.english: From that day forward he never bothered me again.
sentences.chinese: 從那天起，他再也沒找過我的麻煩。

sentences.english: Good - bye, Gian Battista. Kiss the little ones for me . Good - bye, Teresa.
sentences.chinese: 那天下午亞瑟感到有必要多散一會兒步。

sentences.english: That evening when she entered the theatre the manager had a most pleasant greeting for her.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，當她走進戲院時，經理極其和悅地招呼她。

sentences.english: And I remember standing there that day thinking about the disturbers of mine.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得那天站在那邊思慮着“粉碎我的協調的人”。

sentences.english: And when election day dawns at last, Hamas will still be there.
sentences.chinese: 而當選舉那天終於到來時，哈馬斯仍會留在加沙。

sentences.english: The sky was dark on the evening that the Tyrant's emissaries came to Tegea.
sentences.chinese: 在敘拉古的使者來到忒格亞的那天晚上天色很黑。

sentences.english: The star indeed was not lit that night.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上那盞星星燈確實沒有點亮。

sentences.english: Fromthat day on, we were ever so faithful to Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 從那天起，我們對耶穌無比的忠誠又更深一層了。

sentences.english: I remember when the day of DYP's birthday came.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得在鄧羽平生日那天。

sentences.english: That night, the boy couldn’t sleep for disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，小男孩失望極了，翻來覆去怎麼也睡不着。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
